short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wyświetla powiadomienia gdy zostaniesz oznaczony w jakimś nowym poście.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Add-on will display notification once you're mentioned in any comment in braterstwo.eu.
If not configured differently in add-on options it will also highlight comment where You've been mentioned.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This plugin shows notification once You've been mentioned in braterstwo.eu.
Mention is understood to be 'at' sign (@) followed by username of mentioned user.
Once at the page of given topic this plugin will search for comments that You've been mentioned and will highlight this comment.

This is default behavior that can be overwritten in add-on settings.

All You have to do is set Your username from braterstwo.eu in Add-on settings and done.
This Add-on does not send nor gather any data from either you pc or braterstwo.eu.
The only needed piece of information that's needed is Your public username. It is not stored outside Your browser and it is not collected for any purpose.
